description:
Ward & Ward Law Firm - Indianapolis, Indiana, Personal Injury Lawyers

Ward & Ward Law Firm is a father and son personal injury litigation firm located in Indianapolis and serving clients throughout central Indiana. Founded in 1994, Ward & Ward Law Firm is recognized as one of the prominent names in law firms coming to the assistance of people injured because of the negligence or misconduct of another individual, medical professional or corporate entity.

The firm was founded on the principle that an injured person or family that has tragically lost a loved one in an accident deserves to know that their attorney has the technical competency, confidence and experience to work aggressively on their behalf. A successful personal injury case hinges on good communications skills and an ability to work together with the client. As founding partner Don Ward says, "If you treat clients the way you want to be treated by any professional, they'll recommend you to friends and family."

Altogether, attorneys Don and Charlie Ward bring together more than 85 years of combined experience, knowledge and dedication to excellence. Over the decades, the firm has recovered millions of dollars in monetary compensation in settlements and jury verdicts, including cases such as:

  • Motor vehicle accidents, including car, commercial semi tractor-trailer, truck, bus and motorcycle accidents
  • Pedestrian Accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Aviation accidents
  • Railroad accidents
  • Property owner liability
  • Product liability claims
  • Mesothelioma and toxic tort litigation

The firm also assists clients with estate planning and general dispute resolution and litigation needs.

At Ward & Ward Law Firm, clients receive compassionate, personalized attention. Every client is valued and deserves the best representation and respect. The firm provides a free case evaluation and handles all personal injury litigation cases on a contingency-fee basis. You pay no case costs or attorneys' fees if you do not recover monetary compensation in a settlement or jury award.
